title: (x) Meteor, Masterfile connected scripts - similar to Loupot, Coptek {Ignacio, Stephen}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141023221256im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeid_5230.jpg)

Hey, any idea what either the Meteor or the Masterfile typeface is? I'm pretty sure that Meteor is custom, but I feel like I've seen a typeface that's similar...hard angled geometric script.

Cheers!

Jesse
author: et al.

comments.content: Masterfile is custom. It’s designed by Underware.

I knew I had seen it...just couldn't track it down.

Thanks Pieter!
As mentioned yesterday, [Coptek](http://web.archive.org/web/20141023221256/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/376692638/) is also similar.
